name: UAV Airframe (Demo)
description: This is the primary airframe for the custom UAV project. Designed in SolidWorks and optimized for a balance of low weight and high structural rigidity. The design focuses on aerodynamic efficiency simulation full design is classified.

name: Wing Structure (Demo)
description: A detailed look at the internal wing spar structure. This model was used for Finite Element Analysis (FEA) in Ansys to simulate composite failure modes under high-G maneuvers. The final design used a T700 carbon fiber layup for maximum strength-to-weight ratio. (This is just a demo box, but you'd replace it with your wing model).

name: Spring Design Model
description: A Protype Design of a Spring, Designed using SolidWorks.

name: Automatic Solar Powered Boom Sprayer
description: A Pioneer Machine Design for Automatic Solar Boom Sprayer to increase Efficiency of Agricultural Farm Process sponsored by Technical Division of Institute of Agricultural Research (IAR), Ahmadu Bello University (ABU).

name: 3d Printed Servo Cover
description: A 3d Printed Servo Cover made up of PLA and was used as mould to make the carbon fiber prototype, Designed using Solidworks.

name: Sugarcane Grinding Machine
description: A Protype Machine Design for Sugarcane Grinder made with stainless steel, Aluminum, and some other metals.
